title: Post Game: A fragile democracy
description: Chuck talks with Sen. Sheldon Whitehouse (D-R.I.) and former White House Press Secretary Stephanie Grisham about the former president's final weeks in office. He also sits down with Nick Clegg, Facebook’s VP of Global Affairs, on the reform needed on the platform.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
